title: Can't access to augments, missions not progressing
body: What the fuck is this shit? Bilion $ company can't make normal servers???

replies.body: So just released and does not work 100% so you cop an attitude. They are implementing something new and so many things can go wrong, but they are adding new content for us. Sure stuff like this happens on all releases or implementations of now content so don't be such an entitled baby about things and have some patience.
